external.gw.plugin

Interface ClientSystemPlugin

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IPlugin
    Deprecated. 
    External entities are deprecated. Please use the new Java API instead.

    @Deprecated
public interface ClientSystemPlugin
extends IPlugin
    Defines the contract for integration to an external client system. This interface is a marker interface only, which allows for users to register different plugin implementations for each specific interface type.

    • Method Detail

      • approvePendingChange

        void approvePendingChange(java.lang.String pendingContactChangeContextXML,
                        java.lang.String ABUIDContainerXML)
        Deprecated. 
        Informs the client application that the pending change sent by it has been approved.
        Parameters:
        pendingContactChangeContextXML - the context for the change that was rejected as XML
        ABUIDContainerXML - the AddressBookUIDContainer with mapping new AddressBookUIDs to App PublicIDs

      • createAsyncMessage

        void createAsyncMessage(MessageContext messageContext,
                      ABContact contact,
                      AsyncMessageType asyncMessageType)
        Deprecated. 
        Creates a message in the messageContact by serializing the contact to XML.
        Parameters:
        messageContext - The MessageContext from the rules.
        contact - An ABContact entity in ContactManager.
        asyncMessageType - The type of message to create

      • isContactDeletable

        boolean isContactDeletable(java.lang.String linkID)
                           throws ContactCommunicationException
        Deprecated. 
        Checks whether a contact can be deleted from the external client system
        Parameters:
        linkID - the LinkID of the contact
        Returns:
        whether the contact can be deleted from the external client system
        Throws:
        ContactCommunicationException

      • mergeContacts

        void mergeContacts(java.lang.String keptId,
                 java.lang.String retiredId,
                 java.lang.String transactionId)
                   throws ContactCommunicationException
        Deprecated. 
        Advises external system that the contact with the retiredId has been merged onto the contact with the keptId.
        Parameters:
        keptId - the id of the contact being retained
        retiredId - the id of the contact being retired
        transactionId - the transaction id of this message
        Throws:
        ContactCommunicationException

      • rejectPendingChange

        void rejectPendingChange(java.lang.String pendingContactChangeContextXML)
        Deprecated. 
        Informs the client application that the pending change sent by it has been rejected.
        Parameters:
        pendingContactChangeContextXML - the context for the change that was rejected as XML

      • removeContact

        void removeContact(ABContact contact,
                 java.lang.String transactionId)
                   throws ContactCommunicationException
        Deprecated. 
        Removes a contact in the external client system.
        Parameters:
        contact - the ContactManager version of the contact being removed
        transactionId - the transaction id of this message
        Throws:
        ContactCommunicationException

      • updateContact

        void updateContact(ABContact contact,
                 java.lang.String changes,
                 java.lang.String transactionId)
                   throws ContactCommunicationException
        Deprecated. 
        Updates a contact in the external client system.
        Parameters:
        contact - the ContactManager version of the contact being updated
        changes - the changes being made
        transactionId - the transaction id of this message
        Throws:
        ContactCommunicationException
